scripts.generate-index: node_modules/markdown-to-slides/index.js PATRON_CONCEPTION.md --style layout/slides/style.css --script layout/slides/script.js --template layout/slides/template.html -o dist/index.html
scripts.generate-refactoring: node_modules/markdown-to-slides/index.js REFACTORING.md --style layout/slides/style.css --script layout/slides/script.js --template layout/slides/template.html -o dist/refactoring.html
scripts.generate: npm run clean && npm run generate-design-pattern && npm run generate-index && cp -r lib/* dist/.
